mapper.select: SELECT COIN_NAME, PRICE, UPDATE_DATE FROM COIN
SELECT COIN_NAME, PRICE, UPDATE_DATE FROM COIN WHERE COIN_NAME = #{coin_name}
UPDATE COIN SET PRICE = #{price}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate WHERE COIN_NAME = #{coin_name}
INSERT INTO COIN (COIN_NAME, PRICE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{coin_name}, #{price}, sysdate)
